name: Kirana Dewi
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May we always be together, forever by each other's side. ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy bla bla...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and let me know if this made you smile.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
